summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 15, Interlaken Addition, being the alley as platted in the block between 22nd Avenue North and 24th Avenue North, and between Crescent Drive and Interlaken Place, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8109 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
